languages.text: {n}Странное ощущение окутывает ваше тело: вы становитесь легче перышка, а мысли мечутся в голове с невероятной скоростью... Пока вы не осознаете, что смотрите глазами своего призрачного отражения — и одновременно наблюдаете со стороны. Внутренний мир изменяется под натиском вашей воли, и теперь вы можете управлять своим отголоском. Совершить в душе то, что не могли в реальном мире.{/n}

{n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странное ощущение окутывает ваше тело: вы становитесь легче перышка, а мысли мечутся в голове с невероятной скоростью... Пока вы не осознаете, что смотрите глазами своего призрачного отражения — и одновременно наблюдаете со стороны. Внутренний мир изменяется под натиском вашей воли, и теперь вы можете управлять своим отголоском. Совершить в душе то, что не могли в реальном мире.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body, it becomes lighter than air, and inside your mind are thoughts racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from the side — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the pressure of your will, and you can now control your own echo. To do something that you wouldn't dare to in the real world.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}一种奇怪的感觉笼住了你。你的身体变得比空气还要轻盈，而在你的脑海中，无拘无束的思绪如闪电般飞驰。你还没有意识到你正在通过幽影的共鸣远远地观察周围，一切都发生在瞬息之间。你的意志随心所欲地改造着你的内心世界，你甚至可以控制自己的共鸣。此时此刻，你可以尝试某些你在真实世界中绝对不敢轻举妄动的行为。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一种奇怪的感觉笼住了你。你的身体变得比空气还要轻盈，而在你的脑海中，无拘无束的思绪如闪电般飞驰。你还没有意识到你正在通过幽影的共鸣远远地观察周围，一切都发生在瞬息之间。你的意志随心所欲地改造着你的内心世界，你甚至可以控制自己的共鸣。此时此刻，你可以尝试某些你在现实世界中绝对不敢轻举妄动的行为。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una extraña sensación se apodera de tu cuerpo; notas que te vuelves más {mf|liviano|liviana} que el aire, y tus pensamientos discurren a una velocidad increíble. Aún no eres consciente de que miras a través de los ojos de tu eco fantasmal y también lo observas desde lejos, todo al mismo tiempo. El mundo interior cambia sometido a la fuerza de tu voluntad, y ahora puedes controlar tu propio eco. Ahora puedes hacer algo que jamás te atreverías a hacer en el mundo real.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una extraña sensación se apodera de tu cuerpo; notas que te vuelves más {mf|liviano|liviana} que el aire, y tus pensamientos discurren a una velocidad increíble. Aún no eres consciente de que miras a través de los ojos de tu eco fantasmal y también lo observas desde lejos, todo al mismo tiempo. El mundo interior cambia sometido a la fuerza de tu voluntad, y ahora puedes controlar tu propio eco. Ahora puedes hacer algo que jamás te atreverías a hacer en el mundo real.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une étrange sensation enveloppe votre corps : vous vous sentez devenir plus {mf|léger|légère} que l'air, et les pensées s'enchaînent à toute vitesse dans votre esprit. Vous ne réalisez pas encore que vous voyez tout cela à la fois à travers votre écho fantomatique, mais aussi d'un point de vue plus éloigné. Le monde intérieur se ploie à votre volonté et vous pouvez désormais contrôler votre propre écho. Vous êtes en mesure de faire quelque chose dont vous seriez incapable dans le monde réel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une étrange sensation enveloppe votre corps : vous vous sentez devenir plus {mf|léger|légère} que l'air, et les pensées s'enchaînent à toute vitesse dans votre esprit. Vous ne réalisez pas encore que vous voyez tout cela à la fois à travers votre écho fantomatique, mais aussi d'un point de vue plus éloigné. Le monde intérieur se ploie à votre volonté et vous pouvez désormais contrôler votre propre écho. Vous êtes en mesure de faire quelque chose dont vous seriez incapable dans le monde réel.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein seltsames Gefühl erfasst deinen Körper – du wirst leichter als Luft, und die Gedanken in deinem Geist rasen mit unglaublicher Geschwindigkeit. Du erkennst noch nicht, dass du durch die Augen deines geisterhaften Echos blickst und aus der Ferne beobachtest – alles gleichzeitig. Die innere Welt verändert sich durch die Macht deines Willens, und du kannst jetzt dein eigenes Echo kontrollieren. Du kannst jetzt etwas tun, das du in der realen Welt niemals wagen würdest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein seltsames Gefühl erfasst deinen Körper – du wirst leichter als Luft, und die Gedanken in deinem Geist rasen mit unglaublicher Geschwindigkeit. Du erkennst noch nicht, dass du durch die Augen deines geisterhaften Echos blickst und aus der Ferne beobachtest – alles gleichzeitig. Die innere Welt verändert sich durch die Macht deines Willens, und du kannst jetzt dein eigenes Echo kontrollieren. Du kannst jetzt etwas tun, das du in der realen Welt niemals wagen würdest.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}不思議な感覚が体を包む。自分が空気よりも軽くなるのを感じ、頭の中では信じられない速さで思考が駆け巡る。あなたはまだ、自分が影のような残響の目を通して見ていることにも、実際には離れた場所から観察していることにも気づいていない。内なる世界はあなたの意志の力で変化し、あなたは自分の残響を制御できるようになる。今ならば、現実の世界ではやらないようにしていることを行うことができる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不思議な感覚が体を包む。自分が空気よりも軽くなるのを感じ、頭の中では信じられない速さで思考が駆け巡る。あなたはまだ、自分が影のような残響の目を通して見ていることにも、実際には離れた場所から観察していることにも気づいていない。内なる世界はあなたの意志の力で変化し、あなたは自分の残響を制御できるようになる。今ならば、現実の世界ではやらないようにしていることを行うことができる。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf bir his, bedenini ele geçiriyor. Kendini havadan da hafif hissediyorsun. Düşünceler, zihninin içinde inanılmaz bir hızla koşturuyor. Henüz aynı anda hem hayaletimsi yankının gözlerinden baktığının hem de olanları uzaktan seyrettiğinin farkında değilsin. İç dünya senin iradenle değişiyor, artık kendi yankını kontrol edebiliyorsun. Artık gerçek dünyada yapmaya cesaret edemeyeceğin şeyleri yapabilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A strange feeling envelops your body — you feel yourself become lighter than air, and inside your mind your thoughts are racing at an incredible speed. You are not yet aware that you are looking through the eyes of your ghostly echo and are observing from afar — all at the same time. The inner world changes under the force of your will, and you can now control your own echo. You can now do something that you would not dare to do in the real world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaf bir his bedenini ele geçiriyor. Kendini havadan da hafif hissediyorsun ve düşünceler zihninin içinde inanılmaz bir hızla koşturuyor. Henüz aynı anda hem hayaletimsi yankının gözlerinden baktığının hem de olanları uzaktan seyrettiğinin farkında değilsin. İç dünya senin iradenle değişiyor, artık kendi yankını kontrol edebiliyorsun. Artık gerçek dünyada yapmaya cesaret edemeyeceğin şeyleri yapabilirsin.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
